title: Help to ID Script Retro Font
content:
I think it’s a custom job but if anyone knows a similar type i’ll be a happy man :)

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [highway.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/typophile.com/files/highway.jpg) | 10.55 KB |

 [‹ Help me to find out what font this is](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45767 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dansk hjemmepleje service logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45761 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Buya™

comments.content:
’ [Magneto](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Magneto)’, by Leslie Cabarga, may the obvious reply for similar alternates. ;)

Dav

’ [Staromat](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-46-staromat)’, by František Štorm, and, ’ [Atomatic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119074054/http:/www.linotype.com/13837/linotypeatomaticregular-font.html)’, by Johannes Plass, may be some more alternates.

Dav

Ohh, so nearly but diffents at the same time.. i’d have to draw it.

Thank you again Dav!

Juan.
